## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                        | Type                                                   | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `maxWidth` | `max-width` | The max-width of the box container | `string`                                               | `"100%"`    |
| `padding`  | `padding`   |                                    | `"l" \| "m" \| "s" \| "xl" \| "xs" \| "xxl" \| "xxxl"` | `undefined` |

| Event           | Description | Type               |
